QuestData.Title: Attack on Zeb'Tela
QuestData.Description: Our resources are spread pretty thin here, $c, so your help is going to be invaluable. The captain has tasked me with overseeing the harassment of the local Shadowpine troll camps. We have a policy of keeping them off balance until the day when we can launch a brutal offensive to wipe them out.$B$BUntil then, we need all of the volunteers that we can get so that those Shadowpine troll numbers are decreased.$B$BThink you could head east to Zeb'Tela and hurt them a little?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Shadowpine Shadowcasters and 8 Shadowpine Headhunters, and return to Farstrider Solanna at Farstrider Enclave in the Ghostlands.
QuestData.CompletionText: How are you doing with the attack on Zeb'Tela?
QuestData.RewardText: Good, good! You handled that very well! Let's see if you're up to something a little more difficult now.
